name: Admin debug wordpress – enable debug
author: Digital Zoom Studio

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/admin-enable-debug-dzs directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the plugin via the WordPress dashboard as needed.
sections.description:
Only for developers – Can enable debug in the wp-config.php file directly from the plugin. Can also download the debug log directly from the dashboard.
The Admin Enable Debug DZS plugin is a useful tool for WordPress developers, enabling easy management of debugging options within WordPress. This plugin allows developers to enable or disable debug mode directly from the WordPress admin dashboard. It also provides the capability to download the debug log for troubleshooting purposes.

Admin Enable Debug DZS is a WordPress plugin designed for developers. It allows easy activation of WordPress’s debug mode directly from the plugin. Additionally, it provides a convenient way to download the debug log directly from the WordPress dashboard. This plugin is a must-have tool for developers looking to streamline their WordPress debugging process.

This tool is ideal for troubleshooting and development purposes, ensuring a smoother workflow for WordPress site management.

Usage

  • Enable Debug Mode: Go to the plugin settings and click on “Enable Debug”. This will modify the wp-config.php file to set WP_DEBUG to true.
  • Download Debug Log: Access the debug log download feature from the plugin dashboard.

Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or higher.
  • PHP 7.2 or higher.

Support

For support, please visit https://digitalzoomstudio.net/.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPL v2 or later.

Author

Digital Zoom Studio
